item.title: 英语学期作业
item.description: 英语作业-作文 Write an essay of no less than 200 words on one of the following topics: A most influential movie director or movie star A man/woman who changed the world A great sportsman / sportswoman Details might be organized in chronological (时间顺序) order： when he/she was born Jackie Chan Kong-sang，1954年4月7日 how and where he/she grew up 原籍安徽芜湖 what educational background he/she had 成龙曾接受幼稚园和小学一年级（入读在1948年至1960年代位于香港岛坚道的南
